```lisp
[
  (:action pick
    :parameters (?item - object ?agent - agent ?location - location)
    :precondition (and
        (at ?agent ?location)
        (located ?item ?location)
        (not (held ?item))
    )
    :effect (and
        (held ?item)
        (not (located ?item ?location))
    )
  )

  (:action transport
    :parameters (?item - object ?agent - agent ?location_from - location ?location_to - location)
    :precondition (and
      (held ?item)
      (at ?agent ?location_from)
    )
    :effect (and
      (at ?item ?location_to)
      (at ?agent ?location_to)
      (not (at ?agent ?location_from))
    )
  )

  (:action place
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object ?location - location)
    :precondition (and
      (held ?item)
      (at ?agent ?location)
    )
    :effect (and
      (placed ?item ?location)
      (not (held ?item))
    )
  )

  (:action choose
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (available ?agent) (suitable ?item))
    :effect (chosen ?agent ?item)
  )

  (:action lay
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (has ?agent ?item) (perpendicular ?item ?direction) (length_15_45_cm ?item))
    :effect (and (laid ?item ?location) (parallel_strips ?item ?location))
  )

  (:action locate
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object ?location - location)
    :precondition (and
        (at ?item ?location)
        (not (held ?item))
        (available ?agent)
    )
    :effect (and
        (located ?item ?location)
        (held ?agent ?item)
    )
  )
]
```
